languages.text: "В недрах расколотых миров таятся редчайшие металлы и минералы. Впрочем, тут, похоже, успели поживиться до нас".

traits.locale_text: "В недрах расколотых миров таятся редчайшие металлы и минералы. Впрочем, тут, похоже, успели поживиться до нас".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "The bowels of riven worlds contain extremely rare metals and minerals. But it appears someone has beaten us to it in this case."
languages.original_text: "В недрах расколотых миров таятся редчайшие металлы и минералы. Впрочем, тут, похоже, успели поживиться до нас".

traits.locale_text: "The bowels of riven worlds contain extremely rare metals and minerals. But it appears someone has beaten us to it in this case."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The bowels of riven worlds contain extremely rare metals and minerals. But it appears someone has beaten us to it in this case."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The bowels of riven worlds contain extremely rare metals and minerals. But it appears someone has beaten us to it in this case."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The bowels of riven worlds contain extremely rare metals and minerals. But it appears someone has beaten us to it in this case."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Les entrailles des mondes fissurés sont riches en métaux et en minéraux extrêmement rares. Malheureusement, il semble que quelqu'un nous ait devancés. »
languages.original_text: "The bowels of riven worlds contain extremely rare metals and minerals. But it appears someone has beaten us to it in this case."

traits.locale_text: « Les entrailles des mondes fissurés sont riches en métaux et en minéraux extrêmement rares. Malheureusement, il semble que quelqu'un nous ait devancés. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “破碎世界内部往往蕴藏着极其稀有的金属与矿藏。不过在这个世界，似乎有人捷足先登了。”
languages.original_text: "The bowels of riven worlds contain extremely rare metals and minerals. But it appears someone has beaten us to it in this case."

traits.locale_text: “破碎世界内部往往蕴藏着极其稀有的金属与矿藏。不过在这个世界，似乎有人捷足先登了。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「裂け目のある世界の地下には、極めて希少な金属や鉱物が含まれています。しかし、今回は誰かに先を越されたようですな」
languages.original_text: "The bowels of riven worlds contain extremely rare metals and minerals. But it appears someone has beaten us to it in this case."

traits.locale_text: 「裂け目のある世界の地下には、極めて希少な金属や鉱物が含まれています。しかし、今回は誰かに先を越されたようですな」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "In den Eingeweiden gespaltener Welten finden sich extrem seltene Metalle und Mineralien. Es scheint jedoch, dass uns diesmal jemand zuvorgekommen ist."
languages.original_text: "The bowels of riven worlds contain extremely rare metals and minerals. But it appears someone has beaten us to it in this case."

traits.locale_text: "In den Eingeweiden gespaltener Welten finden sich extrem seltene Metalle und Mineralien. Es scheint jedoch, dass uns diesmal jemand zuvorgekommen ist."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Las entrañas de esta clase de mundos suelen contener metales y minerales singulares, pero parece que se nos han adelantado esta vez».
languages.original_text: "The bowels of riven worlds contain extremely rare metals and minerals. But it appears someone has beaten us to it in this case."

traits.locale_text: «Las entrañas de esta clase de mundos suelen contener metales y minerales singulares, pero parece que se nos han adelantado esta vez».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
